wikipedia_page.main:
Nicky Kinnaird MBE is the Belfast-born founder and president of British cosmetic retailer Space NK. Kinnaird's initials, NK, make up the end part of the company's name. She attended the University of Reading, and was named Alumnus of the Year in 2009 for her industry achievements. After starting her career in real estate, she founded Space NK.  In 2007 she sold a 90% stake of Space NK to a private equity house for an undisclosed sum.[1] in 2014 she stepped down from her role at Space NK to set up her own brand consultancy. She serves as a non-executive director on the board of Debenhams and on the board at Lumity.
She was appointed Member of the Order of the British Empire (MBE) in the 2009 New Year Honours.

response: The company was founded in 1991 by Nicky Kinnaird, with the first store opening in Covent Garden in 1993. Space NK became a Manzanita company in 2002 and as of August 2021 the brand has 76 stores across the UK and Ireland.
* Nicky Kinnaird, Founder, SpaceNK. For services to the Beauty Industry.
